post:
We are Fast & [affordable web hosting](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php) provider. Our data center is located in USA Los Vegas. 
All plans include Free SSL and Softaculous (Wordpress Installer). 

Prices mentioned below are after applying 50% recurring coupon "extreme".  


**_Opal - $6/Year OR 0.5$/Month_**

*  3 Domains
*  500MB Disk Space
*  Unlimited Bandwidth
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=1)

**_Emarald Plan - $9/Year OR 0.75$Month_**

*  5 Domains
*  1GB Disk Space
*  Unlimited Bandwidth
*  Unlimited Sub Domains
*  Unlimited Email Accounts
*  Unlimited MySQL Databases
*  Unlimited FTP Accounts
*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=2)

**_Ruby - $18/Year OR 1.5$/Month_**

*  Unlimited Domains

*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=3)

**_Painite - $30/Year OR 2.5$/Month_**

*  Unlimited Domains
*  100GB Disk Space

*  Unlimited Email Accounts

*  [More Info](https://mayohost.com/web-hosting.php)  | [Order  Now](https://mayohost.com/account/order/config/index/webhosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=4)

**Payment Modes**

We accept PayPal, Credit Card, Perfect Money, Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash & Ethereum.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at **admin@mayohost.com**
